title: Application Management
desc: This covers anything related to applications, including session and client tracking.

title: Caching
desc: This category covers a full range of caching options and tricks that are available to ColdFusion.

title: Components
desc: This category covers ColdFusion Components (CFCs).

title: Data Structures
desc: This category talks about different kinds of data structures, or forms of data. It includes questions about lists, arrays, and structures not covered in other categories.

title: Database / SQL
desc: Anything related to databases and SQL.

title: Dates/Times
desc: This category focuses on working with dates and times in ColdFusion.  Common problems faced by developers, such as printing dates and times in different ways, determining the difference between two dates, and dealing with dates/times in non-English locales are all explored in detail.

title: Display and Layout
desc: Issues that relate to the display or layout generated from ColdFusion code.

title: Email
desc: Everything email related.

title: File and Directory Access
desc: File and directory access.

title: Forms
desc: Everything form related.

title: Full-Text Searching
desc: Everything related to the use of the full-text search service within ColdFusion.

title: Images
desc: This category is everything image related.

title: JavaScript
desc: This category covers ColdFusion and JavaScript interaction.

title: Lists
desc: This category is everything list related.

title: Miscellaneous
desc: A catch-all category for items that do not fit elsewhere.

title: Numbers
desc: This category is everything number related.

title: Queries
desc: This category discusses how to work with queries as ColdFusion data structures.

title: Security
desc: This category covers all issues related to security. This includes both at the server level and in your code.

title: Strings
desc: This category is everything string related.

title: XML
desc: This category is everything XML related.
